long_description: Designed from the ground up for competitive trail riding and cross-country racing, the Easton EA90 XC 29 in. Front Wheel offers excellent durability and weighs in at a light 764g. No fussing with rim strips or sealant, the Easton EA90 XC 29 in. Front Wheel is welded for an airtight UST seal right out of the box. UST tubeless compatibility offers the benefits of tubeless (lighter weight, lower tire pressure and fewer flats), with the option of using a traditional tube/tire setup. 19mm internal rim width fits tires to 2.35 in. wide, and a wide tire profile means more surface area for traction on tough trails. The rim is laced with 24 Sapim double-butted spokes for strength, and an anodized red M1 hub with sealed cartridge bearings keeps the wheel spinning smoothly.
short_description: Designed from the ground up for competitive trail riding and cross-country racing, the Easton EA90 XC 29 in. Front Wheel offers excellent durability and weighs in at a light 764g.
